title: Why i have no trust in the ban system
body:
So 3 months ago i run into a player that had a completely racist name, to the point it baffled me that anyone would get away with it in league for more then a few days.

So i decided to ask him, how long he had the name, the answer was a couple of months, and not only that, he had a racist name before that.

Riot you want me to believe you do anything, but it's hard to believe when something that would get an instant 14 day ban, can be in a name, and not just that, this person's name changes aren't being checked after MULTIPLE INFRACTIONS.

Because about a week ago, he got his name changed, most likely from enough reports.

Now he has an even more Racist name.

This player has gone from racist name to racist name with no actual form of punishment, for things i would honestly hope if they were said in chat that they would be picked up, but i honestly know otherwise.

If you can't stop someone from having racist names constantly, why should i believe that you have a good ban system?

This is the sort of shit that makes me believe board's users these days... because it's not the worst i have fucking seen.

Due to name and shame rules i won't be using the name on boards, add me on Discord/League if you want to know what the 3 names were.

Discord: JasonWazza #2068

I see how shitty your ban system is day in day out.

Not only all of the above, but i actually gave the name to Sera's a week ago, and nothing happened.

Maybe now he will listen.

6.3 billion usd PROFIT a year btw haHAA

Funny you say this, about a month ago I found this person who had the N word in their name except the I was replaced with a 1. I asked them for how long they have had that username and they said since season 1, I reported it of course but why the fuck would riot care lol, its why I didnt even bother posting it on the boards because riot oce is a joke.

My original account on NA (before OCE existed) had a name that caused me trouble. Not racist, it just got the wrong reaction from people. Apparently being named "Feeding the Enemy" makes people rage at you. I had an irl friend with a similar issue when he was named "Allah Christ". People rage at you for no reason other than not liking your name, this has been happening since LoL began.

I see racist names all the time. Its laughably easy to get away with because you can just swap characters for numbers or foreign letters/weird symbols.

As far as I can tell Riot hasn't ever banned people from the game for racist names when they will insta-14 day if you say the nword once and got reported. They just send a name reset then think the job is done and go back to ignoring them without even checking what name they chose.
